title: LF Ranked Team for 10 wins Season Reward.
body:
Trying to start up something before the season ends so we can all get the rewards. Essentially our team will need to hit 10 (or 15?) wins. 

* You absolutely need to be playing frequently so we can secure the 10 wins. _That is really the only mandatory requirement! _
* Preferably your rank will be Gold or above, however I'm okay with taking on lower ranks so long as you're willing to learn. 


Please leave your **IGN, Rank & Main Role**. 

Extra points for those willing to be flexible with their roles.

**EDIT:** I've added everyone so far but there is an excess of players. To cater for that, I've created a second team which will have its own captain. There are still spots open for the second team.
